duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyzing business needs, requirements, and translating them into practical ServiceNow configurations.
Working closely with stakeholders to gather requirements and manage expectations.
Leading process mapping, workflow design, and process improvement initiatives to optimize and align business processes with ServiceNow capabilities.
Proficient in gathering business requirements, functional specifications, and user stories.
Creating detailed functional and technical specifications, business process documentation, and use cases.
Understanding Change Management principles and best practices to minimize impact on business operations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, or related field (ServiceNow certifications preferred)
Previous experience as a Business Analyst especially in the IT Service Management domain
